entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then cloudy with a few showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
